verses.verse: And the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me came<WH7725> again,<WH7725> and waked<WH5782> me, as a man<WH376> that is wakened<WH5782> out of his sleep.<WH8142>

And said<WH559> to me, What<WH4100> see<WH7200> you? And I said,<WH559> I have looked,<WH7200> and behold<WH2005> a candlestick<WH4501> all<WH3605> of gold,<WH2091> with a bowl<WH1543> on the top<WH7218> of it, and his seven<WH7651> lamps<WH5216> thereon,<WH5921> and seven<WH7651> pipes<WH4166> to the seven<WH7651> lamps,<WH5216> which are on the top<WH7218> thereof:
And two<WH8147> olive<WH2132> trees by it, one<WH259> on the right<WH3225> side of the bowl,<WH1543> and the other<WH259> on the left<WH8040> side thereof.
So I answered<WH6030> and spoke<WH559> to the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me, saying,<WH559> What<WH4100> are these,<WH428> my lord?<WH113>
Then the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to me, Know<WH3045> you not what<WH4100> these<WH428> be? And I said,<WH559> No,<WH3808> my lord.<WH113>

Then he answered<WH6030> and spoke<WH559> to me, saying,<WH559> This<WH2088> is the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> to Zerubbabel,<WH2216> saying,<WH559> Not by might,<WH2428> nor<WH3808> by power,<WH3581> but by my spirit,<WH7307> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

Who<WH4310> are you, O great<WH1419> mountain?<WH2022> before<WH6440> Zerubbabel<WH2216> you shall become a plain:<WH4334> and he shall bring<WH3318> forth<WH3318> the headstone<WH68> <WH7222> thereof with shoutings,<WH8663> crying, Grace,<WH2580> grace<WH2580> to it.
Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

The hands<WH3027> of Zerubbabel<WH2216> have laid the foundation<WH3248> of this<WH2088> house;<WH1004> his hands<WH3027> shall also finish<WH1214> it; and you shall know<WH3045> that the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> has sent<WH7971> me to you.

For who<WH4310> has despised<WH937> the day<WH3117> of small<WH6996> things? for they shall rejoice,<WH8055> and shall see<WH7200> the plummet<WH68> <WH913> in the hand<WH3027> of Zerubbabel<WH2216> with those<WH428> seven;<WH7651> they are the eyes<WH5869> of the LORD,<WH3068> which run<WH7751> to and fro<WH7751> through the whole<WH3605> earth.<WH776>

Then answered<WH6030> I, and said<WH559> to him, What<WH4100> are these<WH428> two<WH8147> olive<WH2132> trees on the right<WH3225> side of the candlestick<WH4501> and on the left<WH8040> side thereof?

And I answered<WH6030> again,<WH8145> and said<WH559> to him, What<WH4100> be these two<WH8147> olive<WH2132> branches<WH7641> which<WH834> through<WH3027> the two<WH8147> golden<WH2091> pipes<WH6804> empty<WH7324> the golden oil out of themselves?
And he answered<WH559> me and said,<WH559> Know<WH3045> you not what<WH4100> these<WH428> be? And I said,<WH559> No,<WH3808> my lord.<WH113>
Then said<WH559> he, These<WH428> are the two<WH8147> anointed<WH1121> <WH3323> ones, that stand<WH5975> by the LORD<WH113> of the whole<WH3605> earth.<WH776>
